Name: Blaze of Fury
Story Background: In the midst of a fierce battle, a group of mages channeled their collective fury into a single spell, unleashing a devastating inferno upon their enemies.
Ability: Blaze of Fury deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, it can't block this turn.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a group of mages standing in a circle, their hands raised as flames erupt from the ground around them. The flames take the shape of a dragon, which is breathing fire upon a group of enemy soldiers.
